    public abstract class RobotPenActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.content.ServiceConnection, OnUiCallback
    s Created by 王强 on 2017/2/22. 简介：和罗博智能笔服务的绑定方式 所有的回调接口都在UI线程中
